| HistoryText             = Firebrand Squadron were androids with flame like powers. They were created by a [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi]] scientist Otto from the designs of [[Phineas Horton (Earth-616)|Professor Phineas Horton]]. They contained [[Horton Cells]], granting them pyrokinetic powers identical to the [[Jim Hammond (Earth-616)|Human Torch (Jim Hammond)]].{{r|Captain America: Sentinel of Liberty Vol 1 3}} He used the squadron to battle to [[Invaders (WWII) (Earth-616)|Invaders]]. However, they were defeated and destroyed.{{r|Captain America: Sentinel of Liberty Vol 1 4}}
